results.title: Influence of atenolol and nifedipine on nitric-oxide deficient cardiomyocyte hypertrophy and expression of the cardio-endocrine peptide intermedin and its receptor components.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: In @CHEMICAL_NG_Nitroarginine_Methyl_Ester @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019331 @@@L-NAME@@@ treated @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ / @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ abolished increases in systolic blood pressure and plasma @GENE_ADM @GENE_25026 @@@AM@@@ and @GENE_ADM2 @GENE_399475 @@@IMD@@@ levels and in left ventricular cardiomyocytes: (i) normalized increased cell width and mRNA expression of hypertrophic (sk-alpha-actin) and cardio@<m>DISEASE_Endocrine_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004700 @@@-endocrine@@@ (@GENE_NPPA @GENE_24602 @@@ANP@@@, @GENE_NPPB @GENE_25105 @@@BNP@@@, ET) genes; (ii) normalized augmented membrane protein oxidation; (iii) normalized mRNA expression of @GENE_ADM @GENE_25026 @@@AM@@@, @GENE_ADM2 @GENE_399475 @@@IMD@@@, @GENE_RAMP1 @GENE_58965 @@@RAMP1@@@, @GENE_RAMP2 @GENE_58966 @@@RAMP2@@@ and @GENE_RAMP3 @GENE_56820 @@@RAMP3@@@.
